body:
A fix for this issue has been included in [Bazel 7.2.1 RC2](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/tag/7.2.1rc2). Please test out the release candidate and report any issues as soon as possible.
If you're using Bazelisk, you can point to the latest RC by setting `USE_BAZEL_VERSION=7.2.1rc2`. Thanks!
